languages.text: "Должен сказать, Лорд-капитан, экипаж... с непониманием отнесся к тому, что после своей выходки ваш ксенос не был усыплен".
"I must tell you, Lord Captain, that the crew were... dismayed and confused to learn that your xenos was not sedated after his antics."
languages.original_text: "Должен сказать, Лорд-капитан, экипаж... с непониманием отнесся к тому, что после своей выходки ваш ксенос не был усыплен".

traits.locale_text: "I must tell you, Lord Captain, that the crew were... dismayed and confused to learn that your xenos was not sedated after his antics."
"I must tell you, Lord Captain, that the crew were... dismayed and confused to learn that your xenos was not sedated after his antics."
"I must tell you, Lord Captain, that the crew were... dismayed and confused to learn that your xenos was not sedated after his antics."
"I must tell you, Lord Captain, that the crew were... dismayed and confused to learn that your xenos was not sedated after his antics."

languages.text: “我必须告诉你，舰长大人，船员们感到非常……困惑、沮丧，因为你的异形干出了这样的事情，却没有被强制打镇定剂。”
languages.original_text: "I must tell you, Lord Captain, that the crew were... dismayed and confused to learn that your xenos was not sedated after his antics."

traits.locale_text: “我必须告诉你，舰长大人，船员们感到非常……困惑、沮丧，因为你的异形干出了这样的事情，却没有被强制打镇定剂。”

languages.text: « Je me dois de vous prévenir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : l'équipage a été quelque peu... consterné d'apprendre qu'aucun sédatif n'a été administré à votre xénos après sa petite crise. »
languages.original_text: "I must tell you, Lord Captain, that the crew were... dismayed and confused to learn that your xenos was not sedated after his antics."

traits.locale_text: « Je me dois de vous prévenir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} : l'équipage a été quelque peu... consterné d'apprendre qu'aucun sédatif n'a été administré à votre xénos après sa petite crise. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, debo informarle de que la tripulación estaba... consternada al saber que su xenos no había sido sedado después de sus acciones».
languages.original_text: "I must tell you, Lord Captain, that the crew were... dismayed and confused to learn that your xenos was not sedated after his antics."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, debo informarle de que la tripulación estaba... consternada al saber que su xenos no había sido sedado después de sus acciones».

languages.text: 「申し上げます、ロード・キャプテン。乗組員は…あなたの異種族が、奴の道化師に続いて鎮静状態にならなかったため、うろたえ混乱しています」
languages.original_text: "I must tell you, Lord Captain, that the crew were... dismayed and confused to learn that your xenos was not sedated after his antics."

traits.locale_text: 「申し上げます、ロード・キャプテン。乗組員は…あなたの異種族が、奴の道化師に続いて鎮静状態にならなかったため、うろたえ混乱しています」

languages.text: "Ich muss Euch sagen, Lord Captain, dass die Crew ... bestürzt und verwirrt war, zu erfahren, dass Euer Xenos nach seinem Ausbruch nicht ruhiggestellt wurde."
languages.original_text: "I must tell you, Lord Captain, that the crew were... dismayed and confused to learn that your xenos was not sedated after his antics."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss Euch sagen, Lord Captain, dass die Crew ... bestürzt und verwirrt war, zu erfahren, dass Euer Xenos nach seinem Ausbruch nicht ruhiggestellt wurde."

languages.original_text: "I must tell you, Lord Captain, that the crew were... dismayed and confused to learn that your xenos was not sedated after his antics."

languages.text: "Mürettebat, zenonuzun yaptıklarından sonra uyutulmadığını öğrenince çok endişelendi ve şaşırdı Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "I must tell you, Lord Captain, that the crew were... dismayed and confused to learn that your xenos was not sedated after his antics."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, mürettebat zenolarınızın yaptıklarından sonra uyutulmadığını öğrendiğinde çok endişelendi ve şaşırdı."
